location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Sketch-map of the Perso-Baluchistan frontier north & south of Mirjawa.’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:333 x 195 mm.Materials:black ink on paper.

mods.abstract: Sketch map indicating: the frontiers between Persia [Iran], British Baluchistan [in present-day Pakistan] and Afghanistan (dotted/dashed lines); roads and railways; settlements. The map is referred to in a draft letter written by George Henry Garstin Anderson of the India Office, immediately preceding the map (ff 280-281).
